message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 60, you take 40. We can negotiate from here.
I'm willing to give you a bit more than your initial offer, but I think 55/45 is a fair split. We can still work towards a mutually beneficial outcome.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. 50/50 seems like a fair split, considering the decreasing value of the money.
